txed_savelist.help_text: Save any changes made to the TEXTUREx entry

txed_delete.help_text: Deletes the selected texture(s) from the list

txed_new_patch.help_text: Create a new texture from an existing patch

txed_new_file.help_text: Create one or more new texture(s) from image file(s)

txed_rename_each.help_text: Rename separately all the selected textures

txed_export.help_text: Create standalone images from the selected texture(s)

txed_extract.help_text: Export the selected texture(s) as PNG files

txed_offsets.help_text: Mass modify offsets in the selected texture(s)

txed_up.help_text: Move the selected texture(s) up in the list

txed_down.help_text: Move the selected texture(s) down in the list

txed_sort.help_text: Sort the textures in the list

txed_patch_add.help_text: Add a patch to the texture

txed_patch_remove.help_text: Remove selected patch(es) from the texture

txed_patch_replace.help_text: Replace selected patch(es) with a different patch

txed_patch_back.help_text: Send selected patch(es) toward the back

txed_patch_forward.help_text: Bring selected patch(es) toward the front

txed_pnames_add.help_text: Add a new patch to the list

txed_pnames_addfile.help_text: Add one or more new patch(es) from image file(s)

txed_pnames_delete.help_text: Deletes the selected patch(es) from the list

txed_pnames_change.help_text: Change the patch to a different image entry
